content: materials 1 ball aunt lydia s crochet thread extra fine size 30 100% cotton 500 yds shown in color white - each bookmark uses ~ 50 80 yds of the suggested thread crochet hook u s size 11 1 10 mm small darning needle gauge ~ 13 squares wide x 18 squares tall = 2 x 2 gauge varies depending on the number of filled and empty squares in the space notes patterns are written using u s crochet terms stitch sequences outlined in red denote row or segments of the chart that are repeated stitch sequences outlined in green denote repeats that are simplified from the chart gauge is averaged across all four patterns the finished size of each bookmark is noted on its pattern page the first seven row of each bookmark are written out in long form as an aid to starting charts are provided for all bookmarks pattern is free through december 16 2024
